description: This file defines a mock class `CloudStoreImplementationMock` for testing purposes. It inherits from multiple interfaces related to a cloud storage system, mocking methods for storing, retrieving, and managing key-value data, including namespace and cache operations.

classes.name: CloudStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: Mock class for CloudStore implementation, providing fake method implementations for unit testing of cloud store features.

methods.name: ~CloudStoreImplementationMock
methods.description: Default destructor for the mock class.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration of notification handlers for the store.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the unregistration of notification handlers for the store.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a key-value pair within a namespace.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value for a given key within a namespace.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deleting a specific key within a namespace.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registering a notification handler for IStore2 interface.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistering a notification handler for IStore2 interface.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a key-value pair with scope in IStore2.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value with scope in IStore2.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deleting a key with scope in IStore2.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deleting a namespace with scope in IStore2.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Mocks retrieving keys within a scope and namespace.

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Mocks retrieving available namespaces within a scope.

methods.name: GetStorageSizes
methods.description: Mocks retrieving storage sizes within a scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks retrieving storage limit for a namespace.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks setting storage limit for a namespace.
